mapper.select: SELECT , b.demName, IFNULL(c.orgName, b.demName) AS OrgSupName, d.name orgTypeName FROM sys_org a LEFT JOIN sys_org c ON a.orgSupId=c.orgId JOIN sys_demension b ON a.demId=b.demId LEFT JOIN sys_org_type d ON d.id = a.orgtype WHERE a.orgId=#{orgId}

SELECT , b.demName, IFNULL(c.orgName, b.demName) AS OrgSupName, d.name orgTypeName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_org t WHERE t.orgsupid=a.orgid AND t.isdelete=0 AND t.orgcode=#{enterpriseCode} ) isLeaf, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_org t1 WHERE t1.orgid=a.orgsupid AND t1.isdelete=0 AND t1.orgcode=#{enterpriseCode}) parentNum FROM sys_org a LEFT JOIN sys_org c ON a.orgSupId=c.orgId LEFT JOIN sys_demension b ON a.demId=b.demId LEFT JOIN sys_org_type d ON d.id = a.orgtype
AND a.orgSupId NOT IN ( SELECT org.orgId FROM sys_org org WHERE org.demId=#{demId} AND org.orgcode=#{enterpriseCode} AND org.isdelete=0)
ORDER BY ${orderField} ${orderSeq}
ORDER BY sn ASC
